CustomField.formula: IF(State__c = "Closed", 0, if( ISNULL(Date_Time_Out__c),((FLOOR( NOW() - Date_Time_In__c )) * 24) + FLOOR( 24 * ( (NOW() - Date_Time_In__c ) - FLOOR(NOW() - Date_Time_In__c ) )), ((FLOOR(Date_Time_Out__c - Date_Time_In__c )) * 24) + FLOOR( 24 * ( (Date_Time_Out__c - Date_Time_In__c ) - FLOOR(Date_Time_Out__c - Date_Time_In__c ) ))))
CustomField.label: Hours
